creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: three volumes bound as one; volume one: famous court ladies depicted relaxing, talking, playing games, reading, and writing; focus on volumnous, elegant clothing; outside cover is dark blue and gold brocade; cover for volume is dark blue
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Ilustrated  Lives of Famous and Not-So-Famous Women (Ehon tokiwagusa), vol. 1
